shortestMultiplePaths(ArrayList<Station>, ArrayList<Station>, Integer, LocalTime) - Method in class fr.uparis.beryllium.model.Itinerary
Computes the shortest path between all pairs of start and dest stations defined in the corresponding arraylists using the shortestWay algorithm on each pair: For each station in start and each station in dest, this method calculates the shortestWay between the two stations, using the corresponding method and returns the best path, depending on the preference specified between all the computed paths.
shortestPath - Variable in class fr.uparis.beryllium.controller.MapController
